courseSection0.text0: RUS2200 - Intermediate Russian Language and Civilization I (3)

courseSection1.text0: A list of approved restricted elective courses is found in the myKnight audit.
courseSection1.text1:
History
EUH4571 - History of Russia to 1801 (3)
EUH4574 - History of Russia: 1801-1917 (3)
EUH4576 - History of Russia in the 20th Century (3)
EUH4663 - History of Communism in Europe (3)
courseSection1.text2:
Government/Politics
CPO3614 - Politics of Eastern Europe (3)
CPO4643 - Government and Politics of Russia (3)
PLA4830 - World Legal Systems (3)
courseSection1.text3:
Cultural
Complete at least 1 of the following: 
LIT3082 - Continental European Fiction Since 1900 (3)
LIT3931 - Topics in World Literature (3)
LIT4233 - Postcolonial Theory and Literature (3)
RUT3505 - Russian Culture and Civilization (3)
RUS 3955- Study Abroad Credit Hours: 3

li.A minimum GPA of 2.0 is required for all: A minimum GPA of 2.0 is required for all courses used to satisfy a minor.
li.At least 12 hours used in the minor must: At least 12 hours used in the minor must be earned at UCF.
li.Except for the foreign language requirem: Except for the foreign language requirement, no credit by exam may be used.
li.Internship, Co-op, or Independent Study: Internship, Co-op, or Independent Study cannot be used toward the minor.

courseSection0.text:
Other Requirements

A minimum GPA of 2.0 is required for all courses used to satisfy a minor.
At least 12 hours used in the minor must be earned at UCF.
Except for the foreign language requirement, no credit by exam may be used.
Internship, Co-op, or Independent Study cannot be used toward the minor.
